name: Kitchen Chaos (Single Player)
description:
This game is a tutorial based on CodeMonkey's work. You can find his tutorial on YouTube: CodeMonkey's KitchenChaos Tutorial. My game has several custom UI Screens that are not part of the tutorial and some minor game change tweeks.

The changes are mostly because I believe that learning happens best when you change the material slightly. This is because I believe you have to understand what is going on better if you make changes. So, I typically try and do that to all my follow along learning journeys. I think it is a valuable video and highly recommend CodeMonkey's Video.
